headline: UBS: DRAM Supply Shortages Deepen, Micron (MU) EPS Could Hit $30
summary: Micron Technology, Inc. (NASDAQ:MU) is one of the AI Stocks Analysts Are Watching Closely. On October 16, UBS reiterated the stock as “Buy” and raised its price target on shares of Micron from $225 to $245. The firm believes that memory shortages are acute and worsening, particularly in DRAM. It now sees 2026 EPS close to $30. […]

headline: The Biggest Winners from AMD’s (Nasdaq: AMD) Massive OpenAI Data Center Deal
summary: AMD (Nasdaq: AMD) signed a massive deal with OpenAI that was announced before the market opened on October 6th. Since that date, shares of AMD are up an astounding 42% in under two weeks. That’s especially notable since shares of rival NVIDIA (Nasdaq: NVDA) are down more than 2% during that time as large funds rotate ... The Biggest Winners from AMD’s (Nasdaq: AMD) Massive OpenAI Data Center Deal

headline: Why Micron (MU) Is Up 11.4% After Exiting China’s Server Chips Amid Soaring AI Memory Demand
summary: In recent days, Micron Technology announced it will exit the server chip market in China after not recovering from a government ban imposed in 2023, though the company will maintain its automotive and mobile chip sales in the country. This shift occurs as global demand for Micron's high-bandwidth memory and DRAM products, especially for AI and data centers, remains exceptionally strong, prompting widespread analyst upgrades and reflecting significant shifts in global supply chains. We'll...

headline: XNTK: Technology Dashboard For October
summary: SPDR NYSE Technology ETF is an alternative to XLK with an equal-weight approach, broader sector definition, and a tilt to value. Find out why XNTK is a Hold.
